name: verifica-documento
description: This code just checks if a brazilian document (CPF, CNPJ or PIS) is valid or not based on your verify code. For the PIS there is the need of a extra parameter, a boolean, to inform that the verify code has one character.

scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Pierry Bos <bos@pierry.net> (http://pierry.net)
